00028 class cResultRecorder;
00029 
00039 #define Register_ResultRecorder(NAME, CLASSNAME) \
00040   static cResultRecorder *__FILEUNIQUENAME__() {return new CLASSNAME;} \
00041   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(resultRecorders.getInstance()->add(new cResultRecorderDescriptor(NAME,__FILEUNIQUENAME__));)
00042 
00043 extern SIM_API cGlobalRegistrationList resultRecorders;
00044 
00045 
00052 class SIM_API cResultRecorder : public cResultListener
00053 {
00054     private:
00055         cComponent *component;
00056         const char *statisticName;
00057         const char *recordingMode;
00058     protected:
00059         virtual opp_string_map getStatisticAttributes();
00060         virtual void tweakTitle(opp_string& title);
00061     public:
00062         virtual void init(cComponent *component, const char *statisticName, const char *recordingMode);
00063         virtual cComponent *getComponent() const {return component;}
00064         virtual const char *getStatisticName() const {return statisticName;}
00065         virtual const char *getRecordingMode() const {return recordingMode;}
00066         virtual std::string getResultName() const {return std::string(getStatisticName())+":"+getRecordingMode();}
00067 };
00068 
00076 class SIM_API cNumericResultRecorder : public cResultRecorder
00077 {
00078     protected:
00079         // all receiveSignal() methods either throw error or delegate here.
00080         virtual void collect(simtime_t_cref t, double value) = 0;
00081     public:
00082         virtual void receiveSignal(cResultFilter *prev, simtime_t_cref t, long l);
00083         virtual void receiveSignal(cResultFilter *prev, simtime_t_cref t, unsigned long l);
00084         virtual void receiveSignal(cResultFilter *prev, simtime_t_cref t, double d);
00085         virtual void receiveSignal(cResultFilter *prev, simtime_t_cref t, const SimTime& v);
00086         virtual void receiveSignal(cResultFilter *prev, simtime_t_cref t, const char *s);
00087         virtual void receiveSignal(cResultFilter *prev, simtime_t_cref t, cObject *obj);
00088 };
00089 
00095 class SIM_API cResultRecorderDescriptor : public cNoncopyableOwnedObject
00096 {
00097   private:
00098     cResultRecorder *(*creatorfunc)();
00099 
00100   public:
00104     cResultRecorderDescriptor(const char *name, cResultRecorder *(*f)());
00105 
00110     cResultRecorder *create() const  {return creatorfunc();}
00111 
00116     static cResultRecorderDescriptor *find(const char *name);
00117 
00121     static cResultRecorderDescriptor *get(const char *name);
00122 };
